articles.title: India’s Manufacturing PMI Falls To Lowest In Three Months In November - BloombergQuint
articles.description: The IHS Markit India Manufacturing Purchasing Managers’ Index eased to 56.3 in November from 58.9 in October.

articles.title: Mars and Hershey’s accused of avoiding fair pay for cocoa farmers - The Hindu
articles.description: Two of the world’s largest cocoa producers accuse Hershey’s and Mars of avoiding paying a bonus to farmers and cancel all sustainability programmes — that certify the chocolate is ethically produced and allow firms to sell it at higher prices — run by them.
